reviews.review: Im not sure what exactly to compare this to, but I think most importantly, it is fun, and worth the money.

El juego esta bien lo unico malo que encuentro en su juego es que no puedes jugar con tus amigos online y ganar puntos eso si molesta mucho y la unica forma de jugar con tus amigos es en una sala privada en la cual no ganas nada....... espero y hagan un modo donde puedas jugar con tus amigos y ganar puntos .
Cara este jogo é muito bom, ótima trilha sonora, movimentação, etc tem alguns fatores a melhorar sim. O unico ruim é que não tem modo PARTY ainda e fica dificil jogar com os amigos.

i love this game but it crashes every day many times out of all my games this is the only one that crashes.i have a 4770 i7 cpu and a gtx 970 gpu and 8 gb of mem.its not a beast of a pc but its not garbage either.so please fix what evewr is wrong with the game
I got hooked on this game. It's Dwighttastic!

i cant play w my friend when its just us two i have to either solo or wait for the rest of my premade which isnt very fun and also considering i cant get points or lvl up from premades

注意这个游戏的开发公司，是《payday》的开发公司。

到目前为止还是bug漏洞诸多，刚才我就BUG了没有声音莫名观战无法操作，最后算秒退掉了3点段位。我打了整整3个小时，一个BUG回到解放前。

这游戏对喜欢救人的新人不友好，玩熟练了至少18段再去救人，别泥菩萨过河——自身难保。

从《payday》1-2的历史来看，这个游戏的前景堪忧。

payday2套路：1.搞个有趣的模式吸引用户。2.加入不平衡DLC，出售DLC技能，赶走不继续花钱的用户。3.想玩但是不SB的玩家，使用外挂，技术员不管不顾，外挂泛滥。4.忍无可忍，对诚意的底线忍无可忍的老玩家纷纷刷差评。

制作组做出好游戏，运营负责把价值榨光然后毁了整个游戏的体验。
简直破费。想要玩这款游戏的，赶紧前期上车，别等后期各种无敌的外挂改档出来，特价卖个20块钱然后给你倒贴钱的游戏体验，就跟现在的payday2一样，最后再出DLC角色、技能和属性皮肤箱子，简直没钱玩NMB。快来快来，玩个一年就差不多改差评得了。

这个钱，我给开发，差评，我给运营。
As far as alpha games go this one does not disappoint.  Horror enthusiast approved!

이게임 할때 진심 간쪼리면서 해야함 안그럼 훅감 술레 3종류가 있는데 뭐가 나올지 모름
왜 공포영화 보면 일반인 입장을 이재 알겠음

**Old Review**
-------------------------------
This game is awesome!
--------------------------------

**New Review**
------------------------
This game is so unbalanced in favor of survivors. Playing killer is no longer fun or viable. Every survivor knows how to use a flashlight, knows the loops (too many pallets), have OP totems, and killers have been nerfed into oblivion with reduced speeds and large maps.

10/10 This game is amazing! I know that most of you moan about no party system but i can tell you now the Dev team will read the reviews and put Group/Party into the game. They can't afford to not listen to any of you so you should stop not recommending the game because when they do add group in your negative review will always be there for no reason.

Dead By Daylight Pros

Graphics are amazing for a new released game.
GamePlay is fucking shit scary when you turn around and you see that red light.
The fact the killers have some crazy ability like the one thats invisible ive had to change underwear!
I like the fact no killer is OP i like the fact survivors have chances to get away from the killer.
There is always something to do like try to help your freind or repair something.
Love the fact the ranking system is so hard because it will show the real skilled players.
I could go on forever but CBA

Cons 

Group/party as i described (But this will be sorted very soon)
Objective - There needs to be a few more gamemodes other then repair a generator because after a while it gets boring.
The leavers in games to provent others from getting points.
The fact you can sometimes see a survivors arm through a cupboard. Easy Fix
Thats pretty much it for now.

Thank you for reading overall AMAZING GAME! Thank you for making it

Eğer bu türü seviyorsanız kesinlikle kaçırmamanız gereken bir oyun. Kendini oynatıyor ve sıkmıyor en önemli artısı bence bu. Onun haricinde oyun henüz yeni olduğundan bazı sıkıntıları var ancak alıp ta oynamaya engel olacak kadar büyük sıkıntılar değil. Mutlaka alın öneririm.

Even though I have little playing time in this game I do like it a lot. The game itself is great fun as many others have said especially with friends. However there are mutliple things that the devs need to fix/add in order for this game to feel complete such as adding a party system. Right now I'm giving the devs the benefit of the doubt because they have said they are currently working hard on adding the things the community has suggested, a party system being the number one priority.
No, just no.

Holy fuck this game'll get you tense. 5/7 would buy again. Also, most of the issues that everyone complained about is going to be fixed in the next patch - ASAP. Gotta love how the mods interact with the community :)

i do recommend to buy this BUT there is a big problem if U R planning to play with friends then U can't level up on a private match so now U R probably thinking:"ha ,then i'll just invite them to a public lobby" 
so the answer for what you've just said is:"NO ,U can't do that" 
and then U ask"why?" 
and I answer U:"cause........ actually dont know why?" 
so that's kindaa dumb dumb to play with your friends and to think:"ha ,with my friends it's going to be FUN" 
then the answer to that is:"yes it is except for the f***ing thing that not allows U to level up with friends yay that's fun isn't it?"

The Game is great. it just has a few issues which maybe due to the unexpected popularity the game recieved so soon after the beta.

- connection problems; the game has alot of d/c or failing to join games. maybe the servers cant handle so many people trying to play. it kinda sucks to start a game with 4 people and have 2-3 d/c at the start leaving you alone with the killer.

- exploits; the major issue is the use of vaulting over obstacles. while if strategically placed they are a minor help to survivors, certain maps have locations where you can spend an unreasonable amount of time jumping back an forth making it so the killer cant catch you but you cant escape them. maybe a tweek to map design or a debuff on constant use (stamina meter maybe?).

-fixing the trap door escape. the only plus side to the killer getting to the last survivor is that if they dont have at least 2 generators active the trap door wont appear. but if they do then the door is easy to escape with, giving no incentive to saving allies when you could just wait out their deaths and then escape yourself.


probably more minor tweeks (self recovery ability when downed?) but all in all I still really like the game.
Cool game
每局时间必须限定，逃生坑必须减少数量，不然对屠夫简直是太不公平了。

This game is extremely fun to play with friends or alone. If youre a fan of horror games you'll definitely enjoy this one. There is a leveling system for online play that allows you to rank up and unlock new perks for each character. This keeps it fresh as everyone you play with has different perks and abilities which keep the games interesting. You can choose whether you want to be a survivor or a killer. A few things I'd like to see added however are ingame voice chat/text chat, and the ability to play with friends online. Its kind of a bummer that you can't party with 3 other people and play against a random as the killer.

Güzel bir oyun, Arkadaşlar ile daha eğlenceli oluyor. 


TEK SORUN ARKADAŞLAR İLE RANKED MAÇ ATILAMIYOR OLMASI, BU DÜZELTİLİR İSE TADINDAN YENMEZ OYUN!

It's ok.

Bad graphic, bad gamin experience with all the disconnecters, bad  game mechanics, and bad queuing system.
Better spend those 20 bucks for some KFC  instead of piayin this game.

BRILLIANT AND FAVOURITE GAME!



This is an extremely fun game to play with friends. In some cases it is okay to play online, however you'll find barely any team mates will help you. Other than that, this is a really good horror game!


With the addition of Survive with friends it has made the game greatly better you can have hours of fun with your friends, with a new experience each time.

Additionally some of the killers are annoying *cough* the Wraith *cough* and many killers will just camp you on the hooks like they are babysitting you, but everyone has their own play style



Some killers are actually quite cheeky and will team up with you and help you repair generators if you help them kick down barricades/ hit you a few times for points. 

GETTING INTO GAMES

As of patch 1.0.5 trying to get into games is absolutely horrible, you could be sitting in a lobby getting 'no matches found' and then finding that the killer leaves because he is matched with high level players.     KILLERS STOP BEING PUSSYS.


OPINIONS

Personally i get randomely taken off the game whilst normally playing due to unknown errors, where a message is displayed asking why you were taken off the game, which i suppose is good for the developers and their future enhancements.

The ranking up system is slightly bad, you have the skill tree level which is fantastic, then the survivor/killer rank where you have to win numerous games in a row to rank up, an XP system of some sort would be prefered (opinion)


Again, the game is really fun when managing to get into a game and i play i have much fun playing it for hours on end

Все хорошо, но когда траппер ставит 2 - 3 ловушки под крюк с висящим человеком, а потом отходит метров на 20 и смотрит за всем этим, то начинает дико бомбить. 10 трапперов из 10

З.ы 
 Надо вводить штрафы за кемпинг у крюка, какие не знаю, разве что снижать очки за Sacrifice если он все же произошел и система видела что ты не отходил от крюка и смотрел на него. Также вводить ограниченное количество ловушек трапперу, которые он может поставить в 1 месте. Эдакую зону где есть 1 ловушка и вокруг ничего ставить нельзя.

Seitdem es released wurde spiele ich jeden Abend ein paar Runden, abwechselnd als Killer oder Überlebender, wobei mir der Part der Überlebenden am Besten liegt, bin inzwischen Lvl.11 und ich muss mich wirklich zurück halten nicht allzu viel Zeit zu investieren weil es wirklich süchtig macht. Das Zusammenspiel, das Verstecken, die Taktik die sich im Laufe eines jeden Games neu aufbaut, es ist einfach fantastisch. Mir schlägt der Puls jedes Mal wenn ich beim Generatorenreparieren den schneller werdenden Herzschlag höre und überlegen muss wo ich mich am Besten verstecke um dem Killer nicht aufzufallen. Preis/Leistung kann man hier wirklich nicht meckern, habe es im Summer-Sale erstanden und DER Content hat mir bisher mehr Unterhaltung und spaßige Abende beschert als so mancher Vollpreistitel. Kann es nur weiter empfehlen.
to spooky for me... jk really fun
I put a lot into this game, got a ton of replay value, a ton of laughs, for $20. Worth.
Sehr klasse gemacht , viel Spielspaß mit Freunden !

Dead by Daylight...
5 Spieler in einem 4 gegen 1, 4 Überlebende versuchen die 5 Generatoren ans laufen zu bringen um das Haupttor zu aktivieren und zu entkommen, der Killer will das verhindern und seine "Spielgefährten" and seine geliebten Haken aufknüpfen.

So einfach das Spielprinzip ist, so gut funktioniert es i.d.R. auch!

Mein Hauptkritikpunkt ist, dass das Spiel eigentlich noch in der Beta sein müsste! Es gibt noch einige Bugs, die meisten stören kaum und treten auch nicht oft auf, aber sie sind eben vorhanden. Außerdem gibt es da ein paar Sachen im Gameplay/Balancing die dringend überarbeitet werden müssen! Die Entwickler haben allerdings schon über viele dieser Dinge gesprochen und passende Updates versprochen, weshalb ich dort guter Dinge bin.

Mein zweiter Kritikpunkt ist zur Zeit noch, dass man nicht mit seinen Freunden spielen kann außer in einem privaten Spiel wo man allerdings zu fünft sein muss. - Aber auch hier, die Entwickler haben das Verlangen der Community gehört und wollen das so schnell es geht ins Spiel implementieren.

Alles in allem ist das Spiel ein gelungener Koop Thriller, der Dank dem Blutznetz- und Prestigesystems lange Motivation bietet. 
Wer allerdings für die 16-18€ ein komplett fertiges Spiel mit massig Inhalten erwartet, der sollte sich noch ein paar Monate gedulden und dann mal schauen was die Patches alles bewirkt haben und dann zuschlagen!

Ну и вам просто всегда хотелось повисеть на крюке...Тогда эта игра то, что вы давно искали. Вливаейтесь=)

I can say after almost three hours of playing this game, that I will never play this game again, and that I wish I could refund it. It ALWAYS ends in either one of two ways. Either 1, the Killer wrecks everyone, or 2, all, or almost all of the survivors make it out alive.  9 times out of 10, it's the first option. Yes, I get that I'm new to the game, and have a lot to learn, but I have no desire to learn how to play, as there isn't any feed back to help you with getting better. If you're found, you're almost always going to die, unless you are found with a team mate, in which case, hope the killer doesn't come after you.

Let me start by saying this. I LOVE this game. Its so much fun to play, but I can't give it a positive review. There are way too many bugs. Once I was taken off a hook and then i got stuck in the hook for the rest of the game. But the worst part was I finished a game as the Hillbilly (personal favorite) and noticed all of my perks and unlocks were gone. The bloodweb said I  still had them so I couldn't buy them again. This is ridiculous! Devs I love the game but I hate all the stupid bugs and glitches. Please, fix your game!

За выживших и так было не интересно играть, теперь с введением тотемов дара стало максимально бессмысленно и легко играть, я не чувствую, что играю в какой-то хоррор. Боже, что вы делаете с игрой? Что вы сделали с ОРЕХОМ? Почему он теперь реализуется не за свет разрыва дистанции, а его просто в наглую прожимать можно, упираясь в палетку или окно и маньяк не нанесет урона, при этом сурвик просто стоит на месте в этот момент! Это такой кринж, боже. Я просто очень не люблю тупость в играх, а ее с последними обновлениями, завозят лопатами в игру.Станы полеток, неужели вы не видите, что они станят за 3 шага до неё. Сделайте игру за сурва более страшной, а не тупой. В пати реально скучно, приходится самим себя развлекать, иначе можно просто заводить за считанные минуты 5 генов.

I purchased this game for my 17 year old son for 17.99.  After 6 hours of playing over a few days, his agreement was canceled and all progress was lost.  The user agreement states that the game can be canceled at any time.  This does not make sense since it was not a trial but a full version.  Has anyone experienced this before?  I would love to understand why.

Developers won't ban a player for holding the game hostage, tunneling, and camping to the highest extent possible.  They will also only let you know this after you've compiled evidence of a player doing this and have put 15 minutes into a comprehensive report through their website, via a prewritten email they send you instantaneously after submitting a report.

No.  I protest.

Waste of money. Can't join or queue up with friends, or even communicate in-game. Takes longer to find your friends in a lobby than the actual match time, and once the match is over you have to do it again... This game is not what I was expecting at all, waste of money and time. Maybe worth $5.

Разнообразием не блещет, но в наше не простое время данная цена будет вполне приемлима. Использование сторонних средст для коммуникации обязательно.Играть исключительно в дружелюбной компании своих боевых товарищей.За киллера обязательно должна играть девушка,в них прям просыпается что-то тёмное и зловещее. Русские маньяки ставьте Американские сервера,пущай у них зудит,горит,свербит и бомбит. С каждым добавленным маньяком имбованных среди них всё больше.Есть вероятность что с каждой обновой фпс будет становиться всё меньше. Лагов,багов всё больше,а попы играющих трещат всё чаще

My friends and I were camping in a strange place. We heard something strange. We ran away. We saw a weird person near us. We wanted to talk with him. We needed help so we ran to him. He killed all my friends. I am alone in this big forest. I have to survive. I don't know what to do. I saw something like a tunnel. I opened it and I escaped. 10/10 Would sacrifice my friends again.

Trotzdem gilt mein Hass allen Facecampern und ich hoffe ihr werdet als Survivor vor dem Ausgang gekillt mit NOED.
偷电请小心。。

Edit:  After waiting to see if the game would get better, I decided to try it again during its free weekend.  Can't even get into a lobby.  This is sad.  

My negative review is not about the game itself.  I actually like it.  It's one of the few multiplayer games I've ever liked, to be honest. 

So why is this negative?  Because of the embarassingly amount of bugs in its recent state.  Really, the devs should be ashamed of themselves.  My favorite one when I get hooked by a killer, get pulled down by someone and then immediately I get stuck and can't do anything but leave the match.  This happened twice.  This is like something you see in a Greenlight game.   Get your shit together.

YORUM
Merhaba Dead By Daylight incelememi uzun soluklu oynayış ve deneyimlerimden sonra size aktarmak isterim, öncelikle oyun hep kendini  geliştirmekte olan bir oyun grafikler, kenar yumuşatmalar, özellikle mekaniklerin daha gerçekçi olması gibi bir sürü zamanla değişime uğrayan bu yenilikler oyunu canlı tutmaya yetiyor 1500saate yakın şuan oynama saatim var ve bu saat diliminde en fazla 5 hile görmüşümdür toplasanız hatırlamıyorum bile yani hile çıktığı gibi fixleniyor iyi korunduğunu düşünüyorum ve türünün en iyi oyunu olabilir katil kurban kombosu şeklinde bir oyun çıkmasını dört gözle beklemiştim DBD çıkış yaptıktan sonra dedim ki; bu oyun benim için biçilmiş bir kaftan dedim.Oyunun benzerleri yapıldı isim verecek olursa bayıldığım bir oyundur oda 13Friday bilenler bilir oyun çok talihsizlik yaşadı ve çöküş yaşadı o ilk çıktığında ki gibi bakılsa belki DBD`a rakip bile olabilirdi kısaca oyun türünün zirvesi diye bilirim altta değerlendirmelerim var umarım yardımcı olmuştur herkese bol eğlenceli vakitler. :)

Very fun game, i do not why many people give this game negative reviews just because it still has some bugs in it or that they cannot que with friends, but if you could que with friends it would be nealry impossible for the killer to kill those 2-3-4 surivers which they than wouldn't like, so in my opinion it is smart they didn't add it.
You might think the game is limited and you cannot do allot of different stuff, well yeah the game has his basics but it is not limited, you can always taunt the killer if you are bored or try just laying all traps for example on the map just to mess around, so far there hasn't been a second i was bored by this game.
Muy muy muy entretenido, con mucho potencial si los desarrolladores lo actualizan con peticiones.

Pros:
Good concept
Effective graphics
Great sound
Fun when experience levels between survivors and killer is equal


Cons:
TERRIBLE matchmaking (really, the worst I have seen in a game, ever)
Easily exploitable game mechanics (Window vaulting is rage-inducing)
Bad levelling system (Having to pick "perks" that are just pure garbage before you can level...)

I've had some fun times with this - mainly as a survivor.  As a killer, I feel the game is very imbalanced.  I'll revisit this game in a couple months...
游戏本身想法不错，但目前模式和地图单一，期待后续更新。另外，优化还可以再加把劲儿
The gameplay is great and spine tingly, I deffenty see my self playing this alot. But The game need Major Optimztion. im on a GTX 660 and im laggin like rocks runnig speed...
Funny game but you cant play with friends online. There is no option. Only game you can play with your friends give you nothing(level or experience) .

Игра классная, но жаль, что новые оперативники ооооочень дорогие

-Played almost an hour of hide and seek (I think, it feels damn long).
-Last man standing and injured.
-Unable to find instant escape hatch that will open for last survivor.
-Initiate merry-go-round and cross country run.
*****Gotta praise the Infnite stamina*****
-Got the remaining 3 generators up and running.
-Killer got me.
-Wriggled myself out of killer grasp.
-Started another cross country run randomly.
-Found the gate.
-Unlocked it.
-Escape.

10/10 for hide and seek lovers with a theme of horror.

Updated: 6/8/2022

Ok so if you really think this game looks fun go play Evil Dead: The Game instead, I assure you it is 1000x more fun for people who want to play as the killer and the survivors actually have stuff to do to interact besides shine a flashlight or stare at a generator.

I would much rather get beaten on by 4 survivors with baseball bats in Evil Dead than ever play Dead by Daylight again.


Updated: 4/21/2022

Community still incredibly toxic even at lower ranks/levels.

If you want to play killer just don't
If you want to play survivor good luck finding a match.

it has amazing potential. needs lots of work though. as it stands now, not worth the asking price. not enough content to warrent a 20 dollar purchase. it also has lots of bugs and is rough around the edges. if they add more content. as in, new maps that feel different from each other. maybe some killers that didnt worship spider gods. because it gets kinda old really quick. the devs seem really nice and seem to really care about the community. so i have no doubts it will get to a point that 20 bucks will be worthwhile. its just not at this moment.


tl;dr   
    Wait till they add more content and fix bugs to buy the game.

Игра просто супер, давненько не было таких страшненьких игр, но всё как всегда портит баланс) Точнее его просто нет. Вас могут с 1 уровнем кинуть на мясника с 20 или даж с 50 и наоборот. Блин ребят вы гоните? Время НФС Хот Пурсуит прошло. Хотя бы сделали какую никакую сортировку кто с каким уровнем играет. Блин так угавнякать игру( В общем моя оценка 4. Я считаю поиграть стоит каждому) особенно ночью в наушниках) Будете кричать как маленькие шлюшки это стопудово)
На хую вертел разработчиков, не игра а пиздец какой-то когда начинаешь афигенно играть, доходишь до конца и тут тебя выкидывает. ИГра бажная за 4 дня покупки 2 раза словил баги тупо в текстурах висел.но блять эти кики заебали вкрай.
Обратите внимание если выходишь из игры теряются очки и инвентарь. Разрабы сосут хуи. Защеканцы блять.
6\10 ибо нет кооперотива

Классная игра, весёлая, и интенсивная, особенно когда тебя увидит маньяк, то ты построишь себе пентхаус из кирпичей)))

缺点如下：
拔网线的低素质玩家超级多
外挂横行（逗逼熊：怪我咯）
没中文（有汉化补丁）
没组队（不过组队了的话鬼就没法玩了，不过希望能出个类似可以组队的2鬼4人模式）
改存档（存档在本地不加密，恶心死了）
模式单一（4人1鬼）
刷分（唯一的意义）

但是玩起来不错
玩久了不会腻
还是推荐有闲钱的人买买买
